code: export const initialState={screenshot:{username:"用户名",keepTitle:"Keep·户外跑步",miles:3.50,pace:"04'16\"",duration:"00:14:56",calories:250,date:new Date(),temperature:12,humidity:23},bgImage:"/images/bg1_1.png"};export function screenshotReducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case'UPDATE_FIELD':return{...state,screenshot:{...state.screenshot,[action.payload.name]:action.payload.value}};case'SET_BG_IMAGE':return{...state,bgImage:action.payload};default:return state;}}
